it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ServerInterface
    This is the Server Manager, it handles the Listeners, creates the Matches and starts them. It also closes the matches when everyone has disconnected from a Match
    Author:
    Mirko

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClient(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      adds a new client handler to the list of waiting clients and if the timer has expired or the queue has reached the max number of players for a match, starts a new match.

      this method check if there's the minimum number of waiting client to start a match.

      Close match.

      Gets the single instance of Server.
      void removeClient(ClientHandler c)

      this method is invoked by the InitialTimer.
